title: SoFlo Flyboarding taking those who dare to new heights
text:
SoFlo Flyboarding taking those who dare to new heights 
By John Evenson/CBS12WEST PALM BEACH, Fla. (CBS12) - Have you ever dreamed of being a superhero by literally fly through the sky with confidence as your friends cheer you on from below? Those who want to live out their extreme dreams can now experience that phenomenon of flying in West Palm Beach. 
"It doesn't matter how big how small how tall how short, you can fly," explains Rush Bragg, "if you can stand up, you can fly." 
Rush is among the top 15 fly boarders in the World, and wants others to feel the rush. His company SoFlo Flyboarding in West Palm Beach is allowing others to try the sport, which involves special footgear complete with a water jetpack attached to a personal water craft. The propulsion allows the flyboarder to literally fly through air and, as they get better, control what direction they're going and what tricks they might want to try. 
"You can turn you can spin you can dive in and out of the water like a dolphin," explains Bragg, "people love to do that it's the most fun thing to do. Basically it's the superhero aspect." 
It's a feeling you can't describe until you try it, nd if you're anything like Rush Bragg, you're going to get hooked. SoFlo Flyboarding taking those who dare to new heights 
Sunday, October 11 2015, 02:48 PM
